properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 2:04PM PST until February 8 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest seas 15 to 18 feet at 15 seconds tonight,
becoming 13 to 16 feet at 11 seconds by Saturday night. Winds
becoming north 20 to 25 kt Saturday afternoon.

* WHERE...Very steep and hazardous seas are expected beyond 6 nm
from shore and north of Cape Arago Saturday. Very steep and
hazardous seas will spread to all areas Saturday evening.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory is in effect from 1 AM to 4 PM
PST Saturday, with a Hazardous Seas Warning in effect from 1 AM
Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY
